execution_plan.description: Aggregate order counts per customer country in the EU database (sales_eu).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.country AS s1__country, COUNT(orders.id) AS s1__order_count FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id GROUP BY customers.country;

execution_plan.description: Aggregate order counts per customer country in the US database (sales_us).
execution_plan.query: SELECT customers.country AS s2__country, COUNT(orders.id) AS s2__order_count FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.id GROUP BY customers.country;
